summary.span: 表示組件 (Assembly)，此組件是可重複使用、可控制版本和自我描述的 Common Language Runtime 應用程式建置區塊。

span.span: Represents an assembly, which is a reusable, versionable, and self-describing building block of a common language runtime application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別來載入組件，來瀏覽組件，來探索組件中包含的型別，以及建立這些類型的執行個體的中繼資料和組成組件。Use the class to load assemblies, to explore the metadata and constituent parts of assemblies, to discover the types contained in assemblies, and to create instances of those types. 若要取得的陣列物件代表目前的組件載入應用程式定義域 （比方說的預設應用程式定義域的簡單專案），使用方法。To get an array of objects representing the assemblies currently loaded into an application domain (for example, the default application domain of a simple project), use the method. 以動態方式載入組件類別提供下列靜態方法 (`Shared`方法在 Visual Basic 中的)。To load assemblies dynamically, the class provides the following static methods (`Shared` methods in Visual Basic). 組件會載入應用程式定義域載入作業發生的位置。Assemblies are loaded into the application domain where the load operation occurs. - 載入組件的建議的方式是使用方法，用來識別要由其顯示名稱所載入的組件 (比方說，"System.Windows.Forms，version=2.0.0.0，Culture = neutral，publickeytoken=b77a5c561934e089")。The recommended way to load assemblies is to use the method, which identifies the assembly to be loaded by its display name (for example, "System.Windows.Forms, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089"). 組件的搜尋會遵循規則中所述[執行階段如何找出組件](~/docs/framework/deployment/how-the-runtime-locates-assemblies.md)。The search for the assembly follows the rules described in [How the Runtime Locates Assemblies](~/docs/framework/deployment/how-the-runtime-locates-assemblies.md). - 和方法可讓您載入組件反映，但不是執行。The and methods enable you to load an assembly for reflection, but not for execution. 比方說，64 位元平台為目標的組件由 32 位元平台執行的程式碼進行檢查。For example, an assembly that targets a 64-bit platform can be examined by code that is running on a 32-bit platform. - 和方法提供極少數的情況下必須路徑所識別的組件中。The and methods are provided for rare scenarios in which an assembly must be identified by path. 若要取得物件的目前執行的組件，用來使用方法。To get an object for the currently executing assembly, use the method. 許多成員的類別提供組件的相關資訊。Many members of the class provide information about an assembly. 例如: For example: - 方法會傳回提供存取組件的顯示名稱的組件的物件。The method returns an object that provides access to the parts of the assembly display name. - 方法會列出套用至組件的屬性。The method lists the attributes applied to the assembly. - 方法可以存取組件資訊清單中的檔案。The method provides access to the files in the assembly manifest. - 方法提供的組件資訊清單中的資源名稱。The method provides the names of the resources in the assembly manifest. 方法列出組件中的所有型別。The method lists all the types in the assembly. 方法列出呼叫端組件外部可見的類型。The method lists the types that are visible to callers outside the assembly. 方法可以用來搜尋特定型別的組件中。The method can be used to search for a particular type in the assembly. 方法可以用來搜尋及組件中建立型別的執行個體。The method can be used to search for and create instances of types in the assembly. 如需有關組件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 應用程式定義域和組件 > 一節[應用程式定義域](~/docs/framework/app-domains/application-domains.md)主題。For more information on assemblies, see the "Application Domains and Assemblies" section in the [Application Domains](~/docs/framework/app-domains/application-domains.md) topic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得目前執行的組件、 建立該組件，內含類型的執行個體和叫用其中一種類型的方法具有晚期繫結。The following code example shows how to obtain the currently executing assembly, create an instance of a type contained in that assembly, and invoke one of the type's methods with late binding. 基於此目的，在程式碼範例定義名為類別`Example`，與名為方法`SampleMethod`。For this purpose, the code example defines a class named `Example`, with a method named `SampleMethod`. 類別的建構函式會接受一個整數，用來計算該方法的傳回值。The constructor of the class accepts an integer, which is used to compute the return value of the method. 在程式碼範例也示範如何使用方法，以取得可以用來剖析組件的完整名稱的物件。The code example also demonstrates the use of the method to obtain an object that can be used to parse the full name of the assembly. 此範例會顯示組件的版本號碼屬性，而屬性。The example displays the version number of the assembly, the property, and the property. [!code-cpp[AssemblyClass#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyClass/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyClass/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyClass/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果找不到執行階段`typeName`中執行個體，它會傳回`null`而非擲回例外狀況。If the runtime is unable to find `typeName` in the instance, it returns `null` instead of throwing an exception. 這可能是因為：This might happen because: - 您還沒有指定之型別的完整的名稱。You haven't specified the fully qualified name of the type. - 您已指定完整限定的類型名稱，但其不符合類型之大小寫屬性。You've specified the fully qualified type name, but its case doesn’t match the case of the type's property. 如需不區分大小寫的比較`typeName`型別的完整名稱，然後呼叫多載，並指定`true`如`ignoreCase`引數。For a case-insensitive comparison of `typeName` with the type's full name, call the overload and specify `true` for the `ignoreCase` argument. - 型別不存在於目前執行個體。The type doesn’t exist in the current instance. ## Examples 下列範例會定義`Person`類別並呼叫它具現化的方法。The following example defines a `Person` class and calls the method to instantiate it. summary.span: 傳回方法的 ，其叫用目前執行的方法。

span.span: Returns the of the method that invoked the currently executing method.

returns.span: 方法的 物件，其叫用目前執行的方法。

span.span: The object of the method that invoked the currently executing method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此方法，會呼叫方法是由在 just-in-time (JIT) 編譯器內嵌展開，或是如果內嵌方式展開其呼叫端，組件所傳回意外可能不同。If the method that calls the method is expanded inline by the just-in-time (JIT) compiler, or if its caller is expanded inline, the assembly that is returned by may differ unexpectedly. 例如，請考慮下列方法和組件：For example, consider the following methods and assemblies: - 方法`M1`組件中`A1`呼叫。Method `M1` in assembly `A1` calls . - 方法`M2`組件中`A2`呼叫`M1`。Method `M2` in assembly `A2` calls `M1`. - 方法`M3`組件中`A3`呼叫`M2`。Method `M3` in assembly `A3` calls `M2`. 當`M1`不是內嵌傳回`A2`。When `M1` is not inlined, returns `A2`. 當`M1`是內嵌傳回`A3`。When `M1` is inlined, returns `A3`. 同樣地，當`M2`不是內嵌傳回`A2`。Similarly, when `M2` is not inlined, returns `A2`. 當`M2`是內嵌傳回`A3`。When `M2` is inlined, returns `A3`. 也會發生這種效果時`M1`為結尾的呼叫，從執行`M2`，或當`M2`為結尾的呼叫，從執行`M3`。This effect also occurs when `M1` executes as a tail call from `M2`, or when `M2` executes as a tail call from `M3`. 您可以防止 JIT 編譯器內嵌呼叫的方法，藉由套用屬性搭配旗標，但沒有任何類似的機制，可防止 tail 呼叫。You can prevent the JIT compiler from inlining the method that calls , by applying the attribute with the flag, but there is no similar mechanism for preventing tail calls. ## Examples 下列範例會取得目前的方法呼叫的組件。The following example gets the calling assembly of the current method. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Assembly#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/CPP/getcallingassembly1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Assembly#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/CS/getcallingassembly1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Assembly#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/VB/getcallingassembly1.vb#4)]

ConstructorInfo.GetMethodImplementationFlags()。OLEConstructorInfo.GetMethodImplementationFlags().OLE| |InAttributeInAttribute|CorParamAttr.pdInCorParamAttr.pdIn|ParameterInfo.Attributes.InParameterInfo.Attributes.In| |OutAttributeOutAttribute|CorParamAttr.pdOutCorParamAttr.pdOut|ParameterInfo.Attributes.OutParameterInfo.Attributes.Out| |StructLayoutAttributeStructLayoutAttribute|CorTypeAttr.tdLayoutSequentialCorTypeAttr.tdLayoutSequential

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以傳回`null`當 managed 組件已載入來自未受管理的應用程式。The method can return `null` when a managed assembly has been loaded from an unmanaged application. 例如，如果未受管理的應用程式會建立以 C# 撰寫，呼叫 COM 元件的執行個體C# 元件的方法會傳回 null，因為在程序的進入點是 unmanaged 程式碼，而不是 managed 組件。For example, if an unmanaged application creates an instance of a COM component written in C#, a call to the method from the C# component returns null, because the entry point for the process was unmanaged code rather than a managed assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法只會搜尋目前組件執行個體。This method only searches the current assembly instance. `name`參數包含命名空間，但不是含組件。The `name` parameter includes the namespace but not the assembly. 若要搜尋型別的其他組件，請使用方法多載，可以選擇性地包含組件顯示名稱的型別名稱的一部分。To search other assemblies for a type, use the method overload, which can optionally include an assembly display name as part of the type name. > [!NOTE] > 如果類型已轉送至另一個組件，它仍會傳回這個方法。If the type has been forwarded to another assembly, it is still returned by this method. 類型轉送上的資訊，請參閱[Common Language Runtime 中的型別轉送](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md)。For information on type forwarding, see [Type Forwarding in the Common Language Runtime](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md). ## Examples 下列範例會定義抽象`MeansOfTransportation`類別中`Transportation`命名空間。The following example defines an abstract `MeansOfTransportation` class in the `Transportation` namespace. 它會呼叫方法來擷取其物件時，會呼叫方法來取得各種代表類型的屬性，然後在類型上顯示資訊的物件抽象屬性。It calls the method to retrieve its object, calls the method to get an array of objects that represent the type's properties, and then displays information on the type's abstract properties. 請注意，呼叫方法會使用型別的完整格式的名稱 （亦即，其型別名稱以及其命名空間）。Note that the call to the method uses the type's fully qualified name (that is, its namespace along with its type name). [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.assembly.gettype/cs/gettype1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.assembly.gettype/vb/gettype1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法只會搜尋目前組件執行個體。This method only searches the current assembly instance. `name`參數包含命名空間，但不是含組件。The `name` parameter includes the namespace but not the assembly. 若要搜尋型別的其他組件，請使用方法多載，可以選擇性地包含組件顯示名稱的型別名稱的一部分。To search other assemblies for a type, use the method overload, which can optionally include an assembly display name as part of the type name. > [!NOTE] > 如果類型已轉送至另一個組件，它仍會傳回這個方法。If the type has been forwarded to another assembly, it is still returned by this method. 類型轉送上的資訊，請參閱[Common Language Runtime 中的型別轉送](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md)。For information on type forwarding, see [Type Forwarding in the Common Language Runtime](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md). `throwOnError`參數只會影響找不到類型時，會發生什麼事。The `throwOnError` parameter only affects what happens when the type is not found. 它不會影響其他可能會擲回的例外狀況。It does not affect any other exceptions that might be thrown. 特別是，如果找到的型別，但無法載入，可能會擲回即使`throwOnError`是`false`。In particular, if the type is found but cannot be loaded, can be thrown even if `throwOnError` is `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的陣列會包含巢狀型別。The returned array includes nested types. 如果組件和型別上呼叫方法，因為組件相依於尚未載入 （例如，如果其衍生自第二個組件中的型別），組件中的型別就會擲回。If the method is called on an assembly and a type in that assembly is dependent on a type in an assembly that has not been loaded (for example, if it derives from a type in the second assembly), a is thrown. 比方說，就可能發生此第一個組件已載入具有或未載入方法和第二個組件。For example, this can happen if the first assembly was loaded with the or methods, and the second assembly was not loaded. 就可能也會使用載入的組件並方法，如果第二個組件無法找到時呼叫方法。It can also happen with assemblies loaded using the and methods if the second assembly cannot be located when the method is called. > [!NOTE] > 如果類型已轉送至另一個組件，它不包含傳回陣列中。If a type has been forwarded to another assembly, it is not included in the returned array. 類型轉送上的資訊，請參閱[Common Language Runtime 中的型別轉送](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md)。For information on type forwarding, see [Type Forwarding in the Common Language Runtime](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md). 若要擷取的集合而非陣列的物件物件，使用屬性。To retrieve a collection of objects instead of an array of objects, use the property. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示在指定的組件中的型別上的其中一種方法的參數。The following example displays parameters of one method on a type in the specified assembly. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法載入的組件的信任層級是與呼叫組件的信任層級相同。The trust level of an assembly that is loaded by using this method is the same as the trust level of the calling assembly. 若要從應用程式定義域的信任層級的位元組陣列載入組件，請使用方法多載。To load an assembly from a byte array with the trust level of the application domain, use the method overload. 如需使用辨識項使用的多載方法採用位元組陣列，請參閱方法多載。For more information about the use of evidence with overloads of the method that take byte arrays, see the method overload. 反映 c + + 可執行檔可能會擲回。Reflecting on C++ executable files might throw a . 這可能是因為 c + + 編譯器移除重新配置位址或`.reloc`從可執行檔的區段。This is most likely caused by the C++ compiler stripping the relocation addresses or the `.reloc` section from your executable file. 若要保留`.reloc`解決您的 c + + 可執行檔，請指定`/fixed:no`當您要連結。To preserve the `.reloc` address for your C++ executable file, specify `/fixed:no` when you are linking. 請注意，這個方法多載一定會建立新具有它自己的對應物件。Note that this method overload always creates a new object with its own mapping.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果擲回`assemblyRef`指定完整的組件名稱和第一個符合的簡單名稱的組件有不同的版本、 文化特性或公開金鑰語彙基元。 is thrown if `assemblyRef` specifies the full assembly name and the first assembly that matches the simple name has a different version, culture, or public key token. 載入器不會繼續探查比對的簡單名稱的其他組件。The loader does not continue probing for other assemblies that match the simple name. 因為遠端組件中的程式碼的執行已停用預設的情況下，.NET Framework 4 中，從開始如果也會擲回`assemblyRef`指定遠端組件。Starting with .NET Framework 4, because execution of code in remote assemblies is disabled by default, a is also thrown if `assemblyRef` specifies a remote assembly. 若要啟用從遠端位置載入的程式碼的執行，您可以使用[ `` ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/loadfromremotesources-element.md)組態項目。To enable execution of code loaded from remote locations, you can use the [``](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/loadfromremotesources-element.md) configuration element. > [!NOTE] > 請勿使用只有屬性集。Do not use an with only the property set. 不提供任何項目 （例如名稱或版本） 的組件身分識別，因此載入不會根據負載所識別的規則，如您所預期方法。The property does not supply any elements of the assembly identity (such as name or version), so loading does not occur according to load-by-identity rules, as you would expect from the method. 相反地，會載入組件，使用載入來源的規則。Instead, the assembly is loaded using load-from rules. 使用載入來源內容的缺點的相關資訊，請參閱方法多載或[組件載入的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/deployment/best-practices-for-assembly-loading.md)。For information about the disadvantages of using the load-from context, see the method overload or [Best Practices for Assembly Loading](~/docs/framework/deployment/best-practices-for-assembly-loading.md). 是否將某些使用權限授予組件則以辨識項 (Evidence) 為基礎。Whether certain permissions are granted or not granted to an assembly is based on evidence. 組件和安全性辨識項合併的規則如下所示：The rules for assembly and security evidence merging are as follows: - 當您使用方法沒有參數，已載入組件使用載入器所提供的辨識項。When you use a method with no parameter, the assembly is loaded with the evidence that the loader supplies. - 當您使用方法使用參數部分會合併。When you use a method with an parameter, pieces of evidence are merged. 做為引數提供的辨識項的片段方法取代的辨識項載入器所提供的片段。Pieces of evidence supplied as an argument to the method supersede pieces of evidence supplied by the loader. - 當您使用方法多載`Byte[]`載入的通用物件檔案格式 (COFF) 映像，辨識項的參數繼承自呼叫組件。When you use a method overload with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a common object file format (COFF) image, evidence is inherited from the calling assembly. 這適用於.NET Framework 1.1 版 Service Pack 1 (SP1) 和後續版本。This applies to the .NET Framework version 1.1 Service Pack 1 (SP1) and subsequent releases. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 1.0 版，並在未安裝 SP1，當您使用的版本 1.1方法多載`Byte[]`結合載入 （coff） 映像，辨識項的參數。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and in version 1.1 without SP1, when you use a method overload with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a COFF image, evidence is combined. `Zone``Url`並`Site`繼承自呼叫的組件，並`Hash`和`StrongName`取自 COFF 組件。`Zone`, `Url` and `Site` are inherited from the calling assembly, and `Hash` and `StrongName` are taken from the COFF assembly. - 當您使用方法`Byte[]`參數和載入 （coff） 映像，只提供的辨識項會使用。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter and to load a COFF image, only the supplied evidence is used. 呼叫組件的辨識項和 （coff） 映像的辨識項會被忽略。Evidence of the calling assembly and evidence of the COFF image is ignored. 反映 c + + 可執行檔可能會擲回。Reflecting on C++ executable files might throw a . 這可能是因為 c + + 編譯器移除重新配置位址或`.reloc`從可執行檔的區段。This is most likely caused by the C++ compiler stripping the relocation addresses or the `.reloc` section from your executable file. 若要保留`.reloc`解決您的 c + + 可執行檔，請指定`/fixed:no`當您要連結。To preserve the `.reloc` address for your C++ executable file, specify `/fixed:no` when you are linking. > [!NOTE] > 如果兩個屬性和屬性所設定，第一次嘗試載入組件會使用顯示名稱 (包括版本、 文化特性，並依此類推，所傳回屬性)。If both the property and the property are set, the first attempt to load the assembly uses the display name (including version, culture, and so on, as returned by the property). 如果找不到檔案，用來搜尋該組件。If the file is not found, is used to search for the assembly. 如果使用找到的組件，顯示名稱比對組件。If the assembly is found using , the display name is matched against the assembly. 如果比對失敗，就會擲回。If the match fails, a is thrown. ## Examples 下列範例會具現化物件，並使用它來載入`sysglobal.dll`組件。The following example instantiates an object and uses it to load the `sysglobal.dll` assembly. 範例接著會顯示組件的公用類型的完整名稱。The example then displays the full name of the assembly's public types. 當您使用方法沒有參數，已載入組件使用載入器所提供的辨識項。When you use a method with no parameter, the assembly is loaded with the evidence that the loader supplies. - 當您使用方法使用參數部分會合併。When you use a method with an parameter, pieces of evidence are merged. 做為引數提供的辨識項的片段方法取代的辨識項載入器所提供的片段。Pieces of evidence supplied as an argument to the method supersede pieces of evidence supplied by the loader. - 當您使用方法多載`Byte[]`載入的通用物件檔案格式 (COFF) 映像，辨識項的參數繼承自呼叫組件。When you use a method overload with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a common object file format (COFF) image, evidence is inherited from the calling assembly. 這適用於.NET Framework 1.1 版 Service Pack 1 (SP1) 和後續版本。This applies to the .NET Framework version 1.1 Service Pack 1 (SP1) and subsequent releases. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 1.0 版，並在未安裝 SP1，當您使用的版本 1.1方法多載`Byte[]`結合載入 （coff） 映像，辨識項的參數。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and in version 1.1 without SP1, when you use a method overload with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a COFF image, evidence is combined. `Zone``Url`並`Site`繼承自呼叫的組件，並`Hash`和`StrongName`取自 COFF 組件。`Zone`, `Url` and `Site` are inherited from the calling assembly, and `Hash` and `StrongName` are taken from the COFF assembly. - 當您使用方法`Byte[]`參數和載入 （coff） 映像，只提供的辨識項會使用。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter and to load a COFF image, only the supplied evidence is used. 呼叫組件的辨識項和 （coff） 映像的辨識項會被忽略。Evidence of the calling assembly and evidence of the COFF image is ignored. 反映 c + + 可執行檔可能會擲回。Reflecting on C++ executable files might throw a . 這可能是因為 c + + 編譯器移除重新配置位址或`.reloc`從可執行檔的區段。This is most likely caused by the C++ compiler stripping the relocation addresses or the `.reloc` section from your executable file. 若要保留`.reloc`解決您的 c + + 可執行檔，請指定`/fixed:no`當您要連結。To preserve the `.reloc` address for your C++ executable file, specify `/fixed:no` when you are linking. 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，處理器架構會新增至組件識別，而且可以指定為組件名稱字串的一部分。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, processor architecture is added to assembly identity, and can be specified as part of assembly name strings. 例如，"ProcessorArchitecture = msil"。For example, "ProcessorArchitecture=msil". 不過，若要指定組件名稱的建議的方式是建立物件，並將它傳遞給適當的多載方法。However, the recommended way to specify an assembly name is to create an object and pass it to an appropriate overload of the method. 請參閱 。See . ## Examples 下列範例會載入組件，指定其完整的名稱，並列出包含指定的組件中的所有型別。The following example loads an assembly given its fully qualified name, and lists all the types contained in the specified assembly. 若要執行此程式碼範例，您必須提供完整的組件名稱。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 如需如何取得完整組件名稱的資訊，請參閱[組件名稱](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法載入的組件的信任層級是與呼叫組件的信任層級相同。The trust level of an assembly that is loaded by using this method is the same as the trust level of the calling assembly. 若要從應用程式定義域的信任層級的位元組陣列載入組件，請使用方法多載。To load an assembly from a byte array with the trust level of the application domain, use the method overload. 如需使用辨識項使用的多載方法採用位元組陣列，請參閱方法多載。For more information about the use of evidence with overloads of the method that take byte arrays, see the method overload. 反映 c + + 可執行檔可能會擲回。Reflecting on C++ executable files might throw a . 這可能是因為 c + + 編譯器移除重新配置位址或`.reloc`從可執行檔的區段。This is most likely caused by the C++ compiler stripping the relocation addresses or the `.reloc` section from your executable file. 若要保留`.reloc`解決您的 c + + 可執行檔，請指定`/fixed:no`當您要連結。To preserve the `.reloc` address for your C++ executable file, specify `/fixed:no` when you are linking. 請注意，這個方法多載一定會建立新具有它自己的對應物件。Note that this method overload always creates a new object with its own mapping.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果擲回`assemblyRef`指定完整的組件名稱，而第一個符合的簡單名稱的組件有不同的版本、 文化特性或公開金鑰語彙基元。 is thrown if `assemblyRef` specifies the full assembly name, and the first assembly that matches the simple name has a different version, culture, or public key token. 載入器不會繼續探查比對的簡單名稱的其他組件。The loader does not continue probing for other assemblies that match the simple name. 因為遠端組件中的程式碼的執行已停用預設的情況下，.NET Framework 4 中，從開始如果也會擲回`assemblyRef`指定遠端組件。Starting with .NET Framework 4, because execution of code in remote assemblies is disabled by default, a is also thrown if `assemblyRef` specifies a remote assembly. 若要啟用從遠端位置載入的程式碼的執行，您可以使用[ `` ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/loadfromremotesources-element.md)組態項目。To enable execution of code loaded from remote locations, you can use the [``](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/loadfromremotesources-element.md) configuration element. > [!NOTE] > 請勿使用只有屬性集。Do not use an with only the property set. 不提供任何項目 （例如名稱或版本） 的組件身分識別，因此載入不會根據負載所識別的規則，如您所預期方法。The property does not supply any elements of the assembly identity (such as name or version), so loading does not occur according to load-by-identity rules, as you would expect from the method. 相反地，會載入組件，使用載入來源的規則。Instead, the assembly is loaded using load-from rules. 使用載入來源內容的缺點的相關資訊，請參閱方法多載或[組件載入的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/deployment/best-practices-for-assembly-loading.md)。For information about the disadvantages of using the load-from context, see the method overload or [Best Practices for Assembly Loading](~/docs/framework/deployment/best-practices-for-assembly-loading.md). 是否將某些使用權限授予組件則以辨識項 (Evidence) 為基礎。Whether certain permissions are granted or not granted to an assembly is based on evidence. 組件和安全性辨識項合併的規則如下所示：The rules for assembly and security evidence merging are as follows: - 當您使用方法沒有參數，已載入組件使用載入器所提供的辨識項。When you use a method with no parameter, the assembly is loaded with the evidence that the loader supplies. - 當您使用方法使用參數部分會合併。When you use a method with an parameter, pieces of evidence are merged. 做為引數提供的辨識項的片段方法取代的辨識項載入器所提供的片段。Pieces of evidence supplied as an argument to the method supersede pieces of evidence supplied by the loader. - 當您使用方法多載`Byte[]`載入的通用物件檔案格式 (COFF) 映像，辨識項的參數繼承自呼叫組件。When you use a method overload with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a common object file format (COFF) image, evidence is inherited from the calling assembly. 這適用於.NET Framework 1.1 版 Service Pack 1 (SP1) 和後續版本。This applies to the .NET Framework version 1.1 Service Pack 1 (SP1) and subsequent releases. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 1.0 版，並在未安裝 SP1，當您使用的版本 1.1方法多載`Byte[]`結合載入 （coff） 映像，辨識項的參數。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and in version 1.1 without SP1, when you use a method overload with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a COFF image, evidence is combined. `Zone``Url`並`Site`繼承自呼叫的組件，並`Hash`和`StrongName`取自 COFF 組件。`Zone`, `Url` and `Site` are inherited from the calling assembly, and `Hash` and `StrongName` are taken from the COFF assembly. - 當您使用方法`Byte[]`參數和載入 （coff） 映像，只提供的辨識項會使用。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter and to load a COFF image, only the supplied evidence is used. 呼叫組件的辨識項和 （coff） 映像的辨識項會被忽略。Evidence of the calling assembly and evidence of the COFF image is ignored. 反映 c + + 可執行檔可能會擲回。Reflecting on C++ executable files might throw a . 這可能是因為 c + + 編譯器移除重新配置位址或`.reloc`從可執行檔的區段。This is most likely caused by the C++ compiler stripping the relocation addresses or the `.reloc` section from your executable file. 若要保留`.reloc`解決您的 c + + 可執行檔，請指定`/fixed:no`當您要連結。To preserve the `.reloc` address for your C++ executable file, specify `/fixed:no` when you are linking. > [!NOTE] > 如果兩個屬性和屬性所設定，第一次嘗試載入組件會使用顯示名稱 (包括版本、 文化特性，並依此類推，所傳回屬性)。If both the property and the property are set, the first attempt to load the assembly uses the display name (including version, culture, and so on, as returned by the property). 如果找不到檔案，用來搜尋該組件。If the file is not found, is used to search for the assembly. 如果使用找到的組件，顯示名稱比對組件。If the assembly is found using , the display name is matched against the assembly. 如果比對失敗，就會擲回。If the match fails, a is thrown. 如果您呼叫方法超過一次在相同的組件，但以指定不同的辨識項，common language runtime 不會擲回因為不能是不同的辨識項規格的完整性與等號比較決定。If you call the method more than once on the same assembly but with a different evidence specified, the common language runtime does not throw a because the equality and integrity of the different evidence specifications cannot be determined. 第一個成功的辨識項是所使用的辨識項。The evidence that first succeeds is the evidence that is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用所提供的辨識項，將組件載入至呼叫端的定義域。The assembly is loaded into the domain of the caller using the supplied evidence. 表示組件符號的未經處理位元組也載入。The raw bytes representing the symbols for the assembly are also loaded. 是否將某些使用權限授予組件則以辨識項 (Evidence) 為基礎。Whether certain permissions are granted or not granted to an assembly is based on evidence. 組件和安全性辨識項合併的規則如下所示：The rules for assembly and security evidence merging are as follows: - 當您使用方法沒有參數，已載入組件使用載入器所提供的辨識項。When you use a method with no parameter, the assembly is loaded with the evidence that the loader supplies. - 當您使用方法使用參數部分會合併。When you use a method with an parameter, pieces of evidence are merged. 做為引數提供的辨識項的片段方法取代的辨識項載入器所提供的片段。Pieces of evidence supplied as an argument to the method supersede pieces of evidence supplied by the loader. - 當您使用方法多載`Byte[]`載入 （coff） 映像，辨識項的參數繼承自呼叫組件。When you use a method overload with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a COFF image, evidence is inherited from the calling assembly. 這適用於.NET Framework 1.1 版 Service Pack 1 (SP1) 和後續版本。This applies to the .NET Framework version 1.1 Service Pack 1 (SP1) and subsequent releases. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 1.0 版，並在未安裝 SP1，當您使用的版本 1.1方法多載`Byte[]`結合載入 （coff） 映像，辨識項的參數。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and in version 1.1 without SP1, when you use a method overload with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a COFF image, evidence is combined. `Zone``Url`並`Site`繼承自呼叫的組件，並`Hash`和`StrongName`取自 COFF 組件。`Zone`, `Url` and `Site` are inherited from the calling assembly, and `Hash` and `StrongName` are taken from the COFF assembly. - 當您使用方法`Byte[]`參數和載入 （coff） 映像，只提供的辨識項會使用。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter and to load a COFF image, only the supplied evidence is used. 會忽略呼叫組件的辨識項和辨識項 （coff） 映像。Evidence of the calling assembly and evidence of the COFF image are ignored. 反映 c + + 可執行檔可能會擲回。Reflecting on C++ executable files might throw a . 這可能是因為 c + + 編譯器移除重新配置位址或`.reloc`從可執行檔的區段。This is most likely caused by the C++ compiler stripping the relocation addresses or the `.reloc` section from your executable file. 若要保留`.reloc`解決您的 c + + 可執行檔，請指定`/fixed:no`當您要連結。To preserve the `.reloc` address for your C++ executable file, specify `/fixed:no` when you are linking. 如果您呼叫 [\]，位元組\ 方法超過一次在相同的組件，但以指定不同的辨識項，common language runtime 不會擲回因為無法判斷相等和不同的辨識項規格的完整性。If you call the [\], Byte\ method more than once on the same assembly but with a different evidence specified, the common language runtime does not throw a because the equality and integrity of the different evidence specifications cannot be determined. 第一個成功的辨識項是所使用的辨識項。The evidence that first succeeds is the evidence that is used. 請注意，這個方法多載一定會建立新具有它自己的對應物件。Note that this method overload always creates a new object with its own mapping.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從.NET Framework 4 開始，能夠從遠端位置載入的組件中執行程式碼會停用預設值，而且呼叫`LoadFrom`方法會擲回。Starting with .NET Framework 4, the ability to execute code in assemblies loaded from remote locations is disabled by default, and the call to the `LoadFrom` method throws a . 若要載入的組件，並執行其程式碼，您必須使用下列其中一個：To load the assembly and execute its code, you must either: - 組件中明確建立沙箱。Explicitly create a sandbox for the assembly. (請參閱[如何： 在沙箱中執行部分信任程式碼](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md)。)(See [How to: Run Partially Trusted Code in a Sandbox](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md).) - 以完全信任執行組件的程式碼，藉由設定`enabled`的屬性[``組態項目](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/loadfromremotesources-element.md)到`true`。Run the assembly's code in full trust by setting the `enabled` attribute of the [`` configuration element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/loadfromremotesources-element.md) to `true`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ ``組態項目](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/loadfromremotesources-element.md)文章。For more information, see the [`` configuration element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/loadfromremotesources-element.md) article.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `assemblyFile`參數必須參考到不含逸出字元的 URI。The `assemblyFile` parameter must refer to a URI without escape characters. 這個方法會提供所有 URI 中的無效字元的逸出字元。This method supplies escape characters for all invalid characters in the URI. > [!NOTE] > 不支援檔案傳輸通訊協定 (FTP)。File transfer protocol (FTP) is not supported. 如果 URI 提供給`assemblyFile`是 FTP 位址，未載入的組件。If the URI supplied for `assemblyFile` is an FTP address, the assembly is not loaded. 不會有例外狀況擲回。No exception is thrown. `assemblyFile` 可以是絕對或相對到目前的目錄，而且組件會載入至呼叫端的定義域。`assemblyFile` may be absolute or relative to the current directory, and the assembly is loaded into the domain of the caller. 組件可以載入三個內容之一，或可以載入沒有內容：Assemblies can be loaded into one of three contexts, or can be loaded without context: - 載入內容包含探查所找到的組件： 在 GAC 中，主應用程式組件中儲存如果裝載執行階段，或在和應用程式定義域。The load context contains assemblies found by probing: in the GAC, in a host assembly store if the runtime is hosted, or in the and of the application domain. 方法的大部分多載都會將組件載入此內容中。Most overloads of the method load assemblies into this context. - 載入來源內容包含使用者提供不包含在搜尋所探查的目錄路徑的組件。The load-from context contains assemblies for which the user provided a path not included in the directories searched by probing. 、 和 是依路徑載入之方法的範例。, , and are examples of methods that load by path. 如果.NET Framework 4 中，從開始的 URI`assemblyFile`指定遠端位置，組件載入已停用預設的情況下，而`LoadFrom`方法會擲回。Starting with .NET Framework 4, if the URI of `assemblyFile` specifies a remote location, assembly loading is disabled by default, and the `LoadFrom` method throws a . 若要啟用從遠端位置載入的程式碼的執行，您可以使用[ `` ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/loadfromremotesources-element.md)組態項目。To enable execution of code loaded from remote locations, you can use the [``](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/loadfromremotesources-element.md) configuration element. - 僅限反映的內容包含使用載入的組件和方法; 在這些程式碼無法執行內容。The reflection-only context contains assemblies loaded with the and methods; code in these contexts cannot be executed. - 如果使用者產生，或找到此組件，它不在任何內容。If the user generated or found the assembly, it is not in any context. 這會套用至組件載入多載指定位元組陣列，包含組件，並建立使用反映的暫時性動態組件發出，並不會儲存至磁碟的方法。This applies to assemblies loaded using overloads of the method that specify a byte array containing an assembly, and to transient dynamic assemblies created with reflection emit and not saved to disk. 載入來源內容可讓從不會納入探查路徑載入的組件，而且找到並載入，因為路徑資訊由內容維護該路徑可允許相依性。The load-from context allows an assembly to be loaded from a path not included in probing, and yet allows dependencies on that path to be found and loaded because the path information is maintained by the context. 方法有下列缺點。The method has the following disadvantages. 請考慮改用 。Consider using instead. - 如果已載入具有相同身分識別的組件， 會傳回載入的組件，即使指定不同的路徑也是一樣。If an assembly with the same identity is already loaded, returns the loaded assembly even if a different path was specified. - 如果使用 載入組件，之後載入內容中的組件卻試圖根據顯示名稱載入相同組件，則載入嘗試會失敗。If an assembly is loaded with , and later an assembly in the load context attempts to load the same assembly by display name, the load attempt fails. 當組件還原序列化時，可能發生這項目。This can occur when an assembly is de-serialized. - 如果組件是以載入，探查路徑中包含的組件具有相同的身分識別但不同的位置，並， ，或其他非預期的行為可能會發生。If an assembly is loaded with , and the probing path includes an assembly with the same identity but a different location, an , , or other unexpected behavior can occur. - 要求所指定路徑上的 和 或 。 demands and , or , on the specified path. - 如果原生映像存在`assemblyFile`，不會使用它。If a native image exists for `assemblyFile`, it is not used. 無法以定義域中性方式載入組件。The assembly cannot be loaded as domain neutral. - 在.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，不會套用原則。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1, policy is not applied. ## Examples 下列範例會載入組件，指定其檔案名稱或路徑。The following example loads an assembly given its file name or path. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Assembly#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/CPP/assembly.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Assembly#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/CS/assembly.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Assembly#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/VB/assembly.vb#11)]

span.span: Evidence for loading the assembly.

summary.span: 載入組件，指定其檔案名稱或路徑，並提供安全性辨識項。

span.span: Loads an assembly given its file name or path and supplying security evidence.

returns.span: 載入的組件。

span.span: The loaded assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `assemblyFile`參數必須參考到不含逸出字元的 URI。The `assemblyFile` parameter must refer to a URI without escape characters. 這個方法會提供所有 URI 中的無效字元的逸出字元。This method supplies escape characters for all invalid characters in the URI. > [!NOTE] > 不支援檔案傳輸通訊協定 (FTP)。File transfer protocol (FTP) is not supported. 如果 URI 提供給`assemblyFile`是 FTP 位址，未載入的組件。If the URI supplied for `assemblyFile` is an FTP address, the assembly is not loaded. 不會有例外狀況擲回。No exception is thrown. `assemblyFile` 可以是絕對或相對到目前的目錄，而且組件會載入至呼叫端的定義域。`assemblyFile` may be absolute or relative to the current directory, and the assembly is loaded into the domain of the caller. 組件可以載入三個內容之一，或可以載入沒有內容：Assemblies can be loaded into one of three contexts, or can be loaded without context: - 載入內容包含探查所找到的組件： 在 GAC 中，主應用程式組件中儲存如果裝載執行階段，或在和應用程式定義域。The load context contains assemblies found by probing: in the GAC, in a host assembly store if the runtime is hosted, or in the and of the application domain. 方法的大部分多載都會將組件載入此內容中。Most overloads of the method load assemblies into this context. - 載入來源內容包含使用者提供不包含在搜尋所探查的目錄路徑的組件。The load-from context contains assemblies for which the user provided a path not included in the directories searched by probing. 、 和 是依路徑載入之方法的範例。, , and are examples of methods that load by path. 如果.NET Framework 4 中，從開始的 URI`assemblyFile`指定遠端位置，組件載入已停用預設的情況下，而`LoadFrom`方法會擲回。Starting with .NET Framework 4, if the URI of `assemblyFile` specifies a remote location, assembly loading is disabled by default, and the `LoadFrom` method throws a . 若要啟用從遠端位置載入的程式碼的執行，您可以使用[ `` ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/loadfromremotesources-element.md)組態項目。To enable execution of code loaded from remote locations, you can use the [``](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/loadfromremotesources-element.md) configuration element. - 僅限反映的內容包含使用載入的組件和方法; 在這些程式碼無法執行內容。The reflection-only context contains assemblies loaded with the and methods; code in these contexts cannot be executed. - 如果使用者產生，或找到此組件，它不在任何內容。If the user generated or found the assembly, it is not in any context. 這會套用至組件載入多載指定位元組陣列，包含組件，並建立使用反映的暫時性動態組件發出，並不會儲存至磁碟的方法。This applies to assemblies loaded using overloads of the method that specify a byte array containing an assembly, and to transient dynamic assemblies created with reflection emit and not saved to disk. 載入來源內容可讓從不會納入探查路徑載入的組件，而且找到並載入，因為路徑資訊由內容維護該路徑可允許相依性。The load-from context allows an assembly to be loaded from a path not included in probing, and yet allows dependencies on that path to be found and loaded because the path information is maintained by the context. 方法有下列缺點。The method has the following disadvantages. 請考慮改用 。Consider using instead. - 如果已載入具有相同身分識別的組件， 會傳回載入的組件，即使指定不同的路徑也是一樣。If an assembly with the same identity is already loaded, returns the loaded assembly even if a different path was specified. - 如果使用 載入組件，之後載入內容中的組件卻試圖根據顯示名稱載入相同組件，則載入嘗試會失敗。If an assembly is loaded with , and later an assembly in the load context attempts to load the same assembly by display name, the load attempt fails. 還原序列化組件時，也可能發生這種情況。This can occur when an assembly is deserialized. - 如果組件是以載入，探查路徑中包含的組件具有相同的身分識別但不同的位置，並， ，或其他非預期的行為可能會發生。If an assembly is loaded with , and the probing path includes an assembly with the same identity but a different location, an , , or other unexpected behavior can occur. - 要求所指定路徑上的 和 或 。 demands and , or , on the specified path. - 如果原生映像存在`assemblyFile`，不會使用它。If a native image exists for `assemblyFile`, it is not used. 無法以定義域中性方式載入組件。The assembly cannot be loaded as domain neutral. - 在.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，不會套用原則。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1, policy is not applied. 是否將某些使用權限授予組件則以辨識項 (Evidence) 為基礎。Whether certain permissions are granted or not granted to an assembly is based on evidence. 組件和安全性辨識項合併的規則如下所示：The rules for assembly and security evidence merging are as follows: - 當您使用方法沒有參數，已載入組件使用載入器所提供的辨識項。When you use a method with no parameter, the assembly is loaded with the evidence that the loader supplies. - 當您使用方法使用參數部分會合併。When you use a method with an parameter, pieces of evidence are merged. 做為引數提供的辨識項的片段方法取代的辨識項載入器所提供的片段。Pieces of evidence supplied as an argument to the method supersede pieces of evidence supplied by the loader. - 如果您呼叫這個方法一次以上相同的組件，但使用不同的辨識項，指定，common language runtime 不會擲回因為無法判斷是否相等和不同的辨識項規格的完整性。If you call this method more than once on the same assembly but with a different evidence specified, the common language runtime does not throw a because the equality and integrity of the different evidence specifications cannot be determined. 第一個成功的辨識項是所使用的辨識項。The evidence that first succeeds is the evidence that is used. - 當您使用方法使用`Byte[]`結合載入的通用物件檔案格式 (COFF) 映像，辨識項的參數。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a common object file format (COFF) image, evidence is combined. `Zone``Url`並`Site`繼承自呼叫的組件，並`Hash`和`StrongName`取自 COFF 組件。`Zone`, `Url` and `Site` are inherited from the calling assembly, and `Hash` and `StrongName` are taken from the COFF assembly. - 當您使用方法`Byte[]`參數和載入 （coff） 映像，只提供的辨識項會使用。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter and to load a COFF image, only the supplied evidence is used. 呼叫組件的辨識項和 （coff） 映像的辨識項會被忽略。Evidence of the calling assembly and evidence of the COFF image is ignored.

當您使用方法沒有參數，已載入組件使用載入器所提供的辨識項。When you use a method with no parameter, the assembly is loaded with the evidence that the loader supplies. - 當您使用方法使用參數部分會合併。When you use a method with an parameter, pieces of evidence are merged. 做為引數提供的辨識項的片段方法取代的辨識項載入器所提供的片段。Pieces of evidence supplied as an argument to the method supersede pieces of evidence supplied by the loader. - 如果您呼叫這個方法一次以上相同的組件，但使用不同的辨識項，指定，common language runtime 不會擲回因為無法判斷是否相等和不同的辨識項規格的完整性。If you call this method more than once on the same assembly but with a different evidence specified, the common language runtime does not throw a because the equality and integrity of the different evidence specifications cannot be determined. 第一個成功的辨識項是所使用的辨識項。The evidence that first succeeds is the evidence that is used. - 當您使用方法使用`Byte[]`結合載入的通用物件檔案格式 (COFF) 映像，辨識項的參數。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a common object file format (COFF) image, evidence is combined. `Zone``Url`並`Site`繼承自呼叫的組件，並`Hash`和`StrongName`取自 COFF 組件。`Zone`, `Url` and `Site` are inherited from the calling assembly, and `Hash` and `StrongName` are taken from the COFF assembly. - 當您使用方法`Byte[]`參數和載入 （coff） 映像，只提供的辨識項會使用。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter and to load a COFF image, only the supplied evidence is used. 呼叫組件的辨識項和 （coff） 映像的辨識項會被忽略。Evidence of the calling assembly and evidence of the COFF image is ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相依性不會自動載入至僅限反映的內容。Dependencies are not automatically loaded into the reflection-only context. 您無法從組件載入僅限反映內容中執行程式碼。You cannot execute code from an assembly loaded into the reflection-only context. 若要執行的程式碼，組件必須載入執行內容，使用方法。To execute code, the assembly must be loaded into the execution context as well, using the method. 是否將某些使用權限授予組件則以辨識項 (Evidence) 為基礎。Whether certain permissions are granted or not granted to an assembly is based on evidence. 組件和安全性辨識項合併的規則如下所示：The rules for assembly and security evidence merging are as follows: > [!NOTE] > 反映在編譯 c + + 中的可執行檔上可能會擲回。Reflecting on executable files compiled in C++ might throw a . 這很可能被因 c + + 編譯器移除定位位置或.reloc 區段，您可執行檔。This is most likely caused by the C++ compiler stripping the relocation addresses or the .reloc section from your executable file. 若要保留.reloc 位址，請指定`/fixed:no`當您要連結。To preserve the .reloc address, specify `/fixed:no` when you are linking. 僅限反映的內容並無不同於其他的內容項目。The reflection-only context is no different from other contexts. 載入至內容的組件可以卸載只能透過卸載應用程式定義域。Assemblies that are loaded into the context can be unloaded only by unloading the application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相依性不會自動載入至僅限反映的內容。Dependencies are not automatically loaded into the reflection-only context. 若要自動載入相依性，請處理事件和負載事件處理常式中的相依性。To automatically load dependencies, handle the event and load the dependency in the event handler. 您無法從組件載入僅限反映內容中執行程式碼。You cannot execute code from an assembly that has been loaded into the reflection-only context. 若要執行的程式碼，載入組件方法。To execute the code, load the assembly with the method. `assemblyFile`參數必須參考到不含逸出字元的 URI。The `assemblyFile` parameter must refer to a URI without escape characters. 這個方法會提供所有 URI 中的無效字元的逸出字元。This method supplies escape characters for all invalid characters in the URI. 針對指定的路徑`assemblyFile`相對於目前的目錄。The path specified for `assemblyFile` is relative to the current directory. 組件會載入至呼叫端的定義域項目。The assembly is loaded into the domain of the caller. 僅限反映的內容並無不同於其他的內容項目。The reflection-only context is no different from other contexts. 載入至內容的組件可以卸載只能透過卸載應用程式定義域。Assemblies that are loaded into the context can be unloaded only by unloading the application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法載入作業系統標示為已從 Web （例如，暫存檔案從網際網路或內部網路下載） 載入的本機組件。Use this method to load a local assembly that the operating system has flagged as having been loaded from the Web (for example, a temporary file that was downloaded from the Internet or intranet). 之前[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，這類組件已自動載入沙箱應用程式定義域。Before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], such assemblies were automatically loaded into a sandboxed application domain. 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，它們是以完全信任來載入。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], they are loaded with full trust. 您可以使用此方法的替代方案，以套用[ <NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy>項目](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md)應用程式組態檔中。As an alternative to using this method, you can apply the [<NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md) in your application configuration file. 這會導致 common language runtime，若要還原的安全性原則[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]。This causes the common language runtime to revert to the security policy of the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. > [!CAUTION] > 如果您使用這些解決方案，您必須先確認它是安全載入`assemblyFile`以完全信任。If you use either of these solutions, you must be certain that it is safe to load `assemblyFile` with full trust. 討論的載入內容，包括為載入來源內容，請參閱方法多載。For a discussion of load contexts, including the load-from context, see the method overload.
